summary:
As a person I am socially savvy and open-minded. I have the ability to let people feel comfortable and I believe the relationship with people, both professionally and personally, is one of the most important aspects of life.

I have over 10 years experience in the field of digital marketing including social media and influencer marketing. I am a firm believer that integrated and purpose driven influencer marketing is a game changer in the world of advertising. My experience provides a good understanding of the industry and it's 360 possibilities which enables me to guide clients in order to reach their goals.

As a sr. campaign manager I am developing strong relationships with our customers, connecting with key business executives and stakeholders globally. 
I feel most energised and fulfilled when I can turn my know how into show how and drive brand strategies to the next level and love to inspire my surroundings to join the ride.

profile_positions.description:
&.media group is a full service media & content group headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. We are at the forefront of the latest developments in digital marketing, PR, talent management, format development and content production. Our clients range from A-list advertisers, media agencies, influential social media talents to leading TV and online streaming channels. Storytelling is what we do best. Our biggest aim is to inspire, entertain and enrich the perceptions of people all over the world.

At &.agency we couple the rising power of influencer marketing, PR, branded content, (social) media and big data together, with just the right shot of style, we give you a tailor-made marketing cocktail, the like of which you won’t find anywhere else. It tastes good.

We tell brand stories to show the added value your products bring to the lives of your audiences. With exceptional concepts and a captivating media approach, we create a big impact amongst your target audience. Let’s tell your brand new story.

Our top clients are // Amazon, L'Oréal Group, Opel, Puma, Warner Bros Discovery, Shiseido, Praxis, Vinted, Ahold Delhaize, Maxxium, bol.com and many more
profile_positions.title: Sr. Influencer Marketing Manager

profile_positions.company: The Icon Hub | creating iconic connections.
profile_positions.description:
We’re focussed on harnessing the power of partnerships with creative agencies to fabricate campaigns that are unerring in terms of brand strategy. To develop a strong digital footprint by being an agency ally; taking care of full-scale content creation in conjunction with top of the notch agencies.

We offer influencer solutions and a tailor-made business model for every partner and their associated portfolio.  

The partnership gives an agency the "in-house tools" to execute the influencer component of a campaign, while working with a party "out of home". Together we cover each phase of content creation; from strategizing, to concepting and the actual execution of the campaign.  

Call Us Your Campaign Ally or Influencer Partner in Crime...

My Role & Responsibility:
I am responsible for the qualitative functioning and development of the team in order to facilitate success. I make sure they get the support they need in order to thrive in their daily business. I highly believe in leading by example, where I turn my "know how" into "show how".

It’s my goal to concur challenges with the team, our clients and partners, in order to execute campaigns in the best possible way. 

With more than 10 years of experience in social media and influencer marketing I have a good understanding of the industry and its possibilities which enables me to guide clients in order to reach their goals.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Lead Influencer Marketing

profile_positions.description:
We are the pioneers of the influencer marketing movement and can bring your brand story to life through powerful and authentic connections.

IMA joined MediaMonks as part of the S4 Capital Group. S4 is a new era, new media solution embracing data, content, media and technology in an always on environment for global, multi-national, regional and local clients and for millennial-driven digital brands.

With MediaMonks as a digital first creative company and IMA joining forces, a full end-to-end content solution can be offered.

We develop and execute tailored influencer marketing strategies based on a brand's unique DNA and goals. A selection of the brands we collaborate with: Moncler, Under Armour, Heineken, Booking.com, Diesel, NIVEA, Farfetch and many more.

In this role I am responsible to roll out influencer marketing strategies as a senior lead on both the celebrity/ influencer and client side. My main clients as senior lead have been Moncler, NIVEA, Under Armour, Gazprom, Amazon and HP. Working with a wide range of international brands and influencers from all over the world belongs to my daily business. As a senior lead I am also responsible to mentor and train more junior team members that are part of the account teams I am in. Next to that I am responsible for the hiring and managing of interns within the influencer entity at HQ.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Global Influencer Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
IMA is the first full-service, global influencer marketing agency. We help brands deliver global and local impact through the power of influencers. IMA provides best in class, full service influencer marketing capabilities for clients. As a digitally-driven company, we understand the fast pace and flexibility needed to effectively make an impact in today’s consumer landscape. This reflects in our company culture - young, dynamic, international, with over 25 nationalities & offices in Amsterdam & NYC.

From strategy, influencer selection, right through to campaign monitoring and reporting, we always ‘make it happen’. We work with influencers from all corners of the globe, allowing for global strategies and hyper local implementation. 

IMA joined MediaMonks as part of the S4 Capital Group. S4 is a new era, new media solution embracing data, content, media and technology in an always on environment for global, multi-national, regional and local clients and for millennial-driven digital brands.
 
We develop and execute tailored influencer marketing strategies based on a brand's unique DNA and goals. A selection of the brands we collaborate with: Moncler, Under Armour, Heineken, Booking.com, Diesel, NIVEA, Farfetch and many more.

In this role I am responsible to roll out the influencer marketing strategies on both the celebrity/ influencer and client side. Working with a wide range of international brands and influencers from all over the world belongs to my daily business.
profile_positions.title: Global Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
In this role, I am responsible of informing and advising regional (digital) marketing manager worldwide. I am the regional contact point for our digital channels.

Responsibilities: 
Informing and advising regional (digital) marketing managers
worldwide
• Sharing 360 Digital (strategic) briefs and digital assets with all
markets and working together to elevate the end result.
• Sharing insights and results with markets regarding Digital and Social
activations
• Pro-actively informing all markets regarding the global marketing
calendar regarding upcoming campaigns, events and key activities. .
• Be the regional point of contact in regards to social media strategy
• Overseeing Global Branding Website in terms of budget,
news,collection updates, technical issues.
• Strategy building and presentation creator around all global initiatives
and projects
• Coming up with concepts and brief into studio for developing and roll
out (newsletters, website designs, wholesale packages, video/photo
concepts)
• Working closely with all the teams within marketing and ecommerce
globally
• Strategic thinking and activating projects within the consumer journey
team
• Being part of the creation and roll out of the Fashion Show Digital strategy twice a year in NYC, LA, London. 


Achievements: The global team and regions need to be working together seamlessly, to make sure a global strategy can be maintained. I have accomplished time to bring the different cultures/regions already more together than it ever was before. Making sure regions can localize global strategies but still adapted to their needs. Have already built strong relationships with all the regions, which is one of the key objectives within this role.
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Digital Marketing Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: Reporting, Monitoring and Listening on Social Media channel performance of the brand:
•	Owning community management what means monitoring and moderating conversation/content around the brand including but not limited to all active social media channels, responding promptly and appropriately to all consumers but mainly influencers. 
•	Research analysis of key trends/events to feed into community management and wider department 
•	Compiling annual and quarterly social media reports, weekly overviews and ad-hoc campaign reports that demonstrate community growth and community engagement as well as learnings and feed these learnings back into the community management program and report to the wider team.

Achievements: Making sure that there was a smooth reporting process during New York Fashion Week. I set up and prepared everything and was in close contact with vendors to realize the success of the reporting. 
I initiated the daily monitoring around TH Social Channels to be able to engage directly with influencers and report back to the wider team.

Skills: Strong communication with various teams, Analytical insights, Microsoft Office and strong ability to work with several listening tools: Brandwatch, Sprinklr, Simply Measured, Curalate, Radian6, BuddyMedia
profile_positions.title: Global Social Media Coordinator - Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
-	Community management on all TH Global social channels, such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Pinterest, Tumblr, Youtube
-	Benchmarking and researching analyses of competitor activitities.
-	Copywriting and translating social media posts
-	In depth research and analysis of the Dutch community on Social Media linked to the TH community
-	Reporting on Social activities (among other engagement of posts on social media channels, e.g. New York Fashion Week)
-	Supporting multiple teams with their strategic approaches (Digital marketing, Digital PR, Media advertising, CRM, HR)
profile_positions.title: Global Social Media Marketing Internship

profile_positions.description:
-	Optimizing relationships with customers and advice them on their current contract
-	Recruiting new customers by introducing them to the company and offer them the suitable contract
-	Writing editorials about the latest fashionnews to attract attention from the platform users and create visibility to new potential users
profile_positions.title: Assistant account manager and editorialist Internship

profile_positions.description:
-	Running the bar and restaurant together with team members and making sure customers are satisfied and having a good time
-	Manage Room Service and help setting up banqueting events and realize great customer support during events
profile_positions.title: F&B Employee
